amendment.description: To allow the Secretary to include in the definition of special Medicare choice plans for special needs beneficiaries plans that disproportionately serve special needs or frail, elderly beneficiaries.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1073 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1073 proposed by Senator Smith. (consideration: CR S8522-8523; text: CR S8522) To allow the Secretary to include in the definition of special Medicare choice plans for special needs beneficiaries plans that disproportionately serve special needs or frail, elderly beneficiaries.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1073 proposed by Senator Smith.
